--- return_all_distinct.sql
GRAPH MyGraph
RETURN ALL 1 AS a, 2 AS b
NEXT
RETURN DISTINCT a AS a, b AS b

--- AST
&ast.GQLGraphQuery{
  GraphClause: &ast.GQLGraphClause{
    PropertyGraphName: &ast.Path{
      Idents: []*ast.Ident{
        &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 6,
          NameEnd: 13,
          Name:    "MyGraph",
        },
      },
    },
  },
  MultiLinearQueryStatement: &ast.GQLMultiLinearQueryStatement{
    Statements: []ast.GQLLinearQueryStatement{
      &ast.GQLSimpleLinearQueryStatement{
        PrimitiveQueryStatementList: []ast.GQLPrimitiveQueryStatement{
          &ast.GQLReturnStatement{
            Return:        14,
            AllOrDistinct: "ALL",
            ReturnItems:   []*ast.GQLReturnItem{
              &ast.GQLReturnItem{
                Expr: &ast.IntLiteral{
                  ValuePos: 25,
                  ValueEnd: 26,
                  Base:     10,
                  Value:    "1",
                },
                Alias: &ast.Ident{
                  NamePos: 30,
                  NameEnd: 31,
                  Name:    "a",
                },
              },
              &ast.GQLReturnItem{
                Expr: &ast.IntLiteral{
                  ValuePos: 33,
                  ValueEnd: 34,
                  Base:     10,
                  Value:    "2",
                },
                Alias: &ast.Ident{
                  NamePos: 38,
                  NameEnd: 39,
                  Name:    "b",
                },
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.GQLSimpleLinearQueryStatement{
        PrimitiveQueryStatementList: []ast.GQLPrimitiveQueryStatement{
          &ast.GQLReturnStatement{
            Return:        45,
            AllOrDistinct: "DISTINCT",
            ReturnItems:   []*ast.GQLReturnItem{
              &ast.GQLReturnItem{
                Expr: &ast.Ident{
                  NamePos: 61,
                  NameEnd: 62,
                  Name:    "a",
                },
                Alias: &ast.Ident{
                  NamePos: 66,
                  NameEnd: 67,
                  Name:    "a",
                },
              },
              &ast.GQLReturnItem{
                Expr: &ast.Ident{
                  NamePos: 69,
                  NameEnd: 70,
                  Name:    "b",
                },
                Alias: &ast.Ident{
                  NamePos: 74,
                  NameEnd: 75,
                  Name:    "b",
                },
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
GRAPH MyGraph RETURN ALL 1 AS a, 2 AS b NEXT RETURN DISTINCT a AS a, b AS b
